website_summaries.verdict: Fold-down crib makes it easy to travel with or to store when not in use, as it folds down to 6 inches.
pros: Includes 4 wheels to move the crib easily
Certified with JPMA to meet or exceed safety standards
Smart fold-down design is great for travel
Versatility is nice for a daycare

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a solution for co sleeping and this was the perfect choice! I am using regular crib sheets just tucking them under the mattress to make a tight fit. I purchased another mattress from LA Baby because the one that comes with this crib is not really a mattress. Love this crib!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dragana

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. The assembly wasn't too bad, but then again I didn't put it together, lol. We live in a cozy apartment for now and space is at a premium. This was a perfect space saver. My 16 month has enough space.we bought it when she was 12 months old and we are still using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mikki M&

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 2 of these. Easy to build and easy to store it away neatly. Provides room and is comfy for my son. Folds away nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Flavio Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Never buying a big crib again!
customer_reviews.text: This crib is perfect for small spaces! I would say it’s the length of a pack and play but a little skinnier than one. I am so happy we purchased this because we wanted to make the nursery a guest bedroom as well when we have guest so it’s easy to move or fold up!
customer_reviews.author: HopeS

customer_reviews.title: Great Crib...but, 'Incorrect Product Information'
customer_reviews.text: This is a good crib and has many features, but we purchased this crib with the assumption that the height could be adjusted. It seems this is not the case. 'GROWS WITH BABY: The 2 position mattress height adjustment on this crib allows you to lower the mattress as your baby begins to sit or stand.' After reading the actual instructions, it seems the height cannot adjust to 2 positions as stated above and 'grow with baby'. In addition, we would recommend getting a separate mattress pad as well. In the end, it is still a good crib and a definite space saver, BUT please beware before buying.
customer_reviews.author: JMJ2

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Perfect for overnighters at Grandpa & Grandma's! We also took it on a 1300mi Road trip from Tucson, az up to Seattle area and back, it got sun/wind/rain exposure and you can't even tell! Worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed. Easy enough to assemble (my husband did it with excellent instructions provided). I love the way it folds up - it takes up less space than my Graco Pack and Play because it is thin when folded. I store it between the wall and my dryer in the laundry room. Very solid. The 18mos old fit nicely in the bed and couldn't climb out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute crib. Love the portability. A pain to put together alone while being 8 months Prego:) but that was my fault. I could have waited for my hubby! Def bought a new mattress for super inexpensive and it fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kinley

customer_reviews.title: Paint comes off easily, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for out grandson, but unfortunately the paint comes off in places where he puts his mouth directly on the wood. Also he rubbed it hard enough in one place and little pieces of wood splinters are now sticking out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These cribs are great! Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these cribs for my twins to sleep in at my parents' house. They were 6 months old at the time. We had them in these cribs the year after as well. These cribs are great! Very sturdy. They were too small for them this past summer, though. I would say these would work very well, depending on size, up until about age 2.
customer_reviews.author: JAML

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for Grandmas house! 😀
customer_reviews.text: Great portable safe sleeping space for my 2 1/2 Grandaughter when she comes to sleep over. I thought when ordering it might be to short for her to stretch out on, but that is not so. Was using a pack and play bed that was too short for her to stretch out on when she slept. I ordered next day delivery with prime membership and Amazon had it delivered as stated it would on time, in great condition. I love that this folds up when not in use! Some complain of the mattress thickness, i find it acceptable and my Grandaughter loves her new little bed. For the pricing this is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected for $100!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble, looks really nice, functions well! I put it together by myself with no issues in like 30 minutes and I'm a gabillion weeks pregnant, so I'll call that a win! The gray color is really nice, it looks very sturdy, it's easy to use, and I'm very very happy with the purchase! We're using it in an airbnb unit but I almost want another one for my own baby since it's so convenient and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Chemical odor does not go away. Returning
customer_reviews.text: Had a strong chemical odor upon arrival and unboxing... we let it air out by a window for hours. My husband put it together. It’s been sitting out in our living room for weeks now (baby is still sleeping in a bassinet at this point), and it STILL has that chemical odor. I’ve even wiped it down several times but that didn’t help. The fact that it still smells even after all this time is disturbing. I am returning it. I’m not comfortable putting my baby in this crib to sleep with it still smelling like that.
customer_reviews.author: WRPmom52716

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We love it! We are Fostering and though we have no idea if we will get a baby or not it’s required that we have a crib, so love the fact that it folds up in case we get an older child and don’t need to use it. The color is perfect. Our 6yr old climbed and stood in it and it held solid. Hubby didn’t see the directions taped to a piece so put it together without following anything so I’d say setup is pretty easy.... I have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Real review! sick of the fake BS! Your welcome

customer_reviews.title: Folds up/down easily, sturdy! Like it a lot but unable to find a mattress with these dimensions.
customer_reviews.text: Folds up/down easily. Not sure about the distance between the slats, my baby does get her arms/legs wedged in them. We have the bumper now that goes around it but still not 100% sold on that. Fits through our doors which are very narrow which is AWESOME. Tried other pack and plays, porta cribs and this was the only one that fit. Only issue is that I can't find a real mattress (i.e. not a mattress pad) that fits the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: M.K

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This crib is awesome, compact and sturdy. I love the wheels. I recommend buying an additional mattress, as other reviewers mention. My photo has an additional mattress with original one below mine, I use the original one folded on one side to elevate my baby for acid reflex problems.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Crib is convenient and pretty BUT IT HAS A CHEMICAL GASSY SMELL not VOC certified. I tried everything to get rid of the smell (baking soda, airing it out, lysol, vinegar) it just doenst go away and it is so strong I got a headache for a couple of days. Wont lent my baby sleep in this crib.
customer_reviews.author: Alejo Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: the chemical smell!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dark cherry one back in August 2019, it had this very strong chemical smell as soon as we opened it, we left it outside in the backyard since the delivery day in Aug, today is Nov 13, that smell is still there!! I regret that I decided to return it, but my wife said wait few more days and we forgot about it, I washed it with distilled vinegar, that smell is still there!!!! those that bought this, how can you let your kid sleep in it??????
customer_reviews.author: Zhi

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in the manufacturer’s original packaging damaged on both sides (two different spots). Not happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Yulia Hillman

customer_reviews.title: Works Until Baby Starts Climbing
customer_reviews.text: This crib is great until infants start trying to climb out of it. I got the natural wood so didn’t have to worry about chemical smell. It did need to be sanded because it wasn’t smooth but that took less than 10 minutes. It needed a better mattress so I got the DreamOnMe 3”. Once my LO started trying to climb out, her knee and toes got stuck between the slats and it was awful. I don’t trust it anymore because she’s constantly trying to climb out and it’s not safe for that.
customer_reviews.author: Finda G.

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: All in all it did serve the purpose of using it only for few nights at the grandparents house. But I would not use it as an actual permanent baby crib. Does not seem sturdy or stable enough to last very long and that mattress that goes in equals to a cardboard. To be putting towles and such under it I don't know have safe would that be. I would not recommend this product. That it is easy to fold, that sure is. But I don't not know if that is a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mery Kunac

customer_reviews.title: Nice mini crib
customer_reviews.text: It’s small enough to fit next to my bed and big enough for my growing baby who is 27 inches now and can’t really fit in his bassinet. I bought a very firm extra mattress to put in it because the one that comes with it is good for travel only becuase it’s suoer thin and uncomfortable looking. It is perfect eye level with my bed which is kind high up and it’s on rollers which is perfect so I can’t move it when I get in and out of bed. I also put mesh crib liner in it so my babies hands and feet wouldn’t get stuck in slats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlover28

customer_reviews.title: Wrong hole, strong smell
customer_reviews.text: There is 1 hole that has been made from the wrong side of the left plank, which doesn't allow the screw to go in... Needed to use a knife to widen it myself on the other side... It also has an extremely strong smell of varnish and plastic. Currently on my balcony, hoping it will go away.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Kuoch

customer_reviews.title: Paint easily comes off
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for several months. I really liked everything about it until now my son got some teeth. Within a matter of minute, he chewed on the side and had a face FULL of white paint and a diaper full of white paint flecks the next day. I am shocked. We’ve had another crib for our other two babies and the paint didn’t chip off (yes there was teeth marks) so readily and in such huge quantities even when they did go through phases of biting.
customer_reviews.author: J G A

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: The crib came neatly package...nothing broken, noticed maybe 2 or 3 slight scratches... the product was easy to assemble with clear instructions, it took me about a 1 and a half because it was me alone and at 38 weeks too. Easy to maneuver due to wheels and can be folded, you can only utilize 2 of the 3 levels of height change for the mattress. I brought a 4 inch sorta mattress as the one that came with crib is thin. The crib overall is pretty stable and looks very nice. Only little thing for me is I find it could be a little more sturdy. Great buy overall all.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This crib smells incredibly toxic
customer_reviews.text: This crib smells so strong of fresh paint that I’m worried it is making my son sick. After two nights in this my little guy’s nose is running, his eyes are itchy and he wakes up at night which he hasn’t done in a long time. I’m going to throw this out - the smell fills the whole room and make me nauseous. I do not recommend this crib for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: J. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product, can't get replacement
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged with chipped wood. The packaging was perfectly fine. We tried to contact customer support and was redirected to use their website. It’s been a few weeks with additional emails/calls from us and we still haven’t heard back. I desperately wanted to make this crib work, so we ordered the same crib again, and this time there is wood splinter on one of the side rails facing the baby. Now we have to return both of them and I have lost complete faith on this company. This looks like a nice crib, unfortunately the quality is inconsistent and I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pixel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, looks nice, I think it looks nicer than the white ones I own. Thinking about switching out the other cribs.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: It may not be reliable when it come to safety of my baby.
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning I thought it was an amazing product. My baby looked happy but today my baby fell off between the slats and the ply straight on the floor and started crying. I am very sad and worried if I should let her sleep on that ever.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great crib for small places
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice little crib! I bought this for when my granddaughter visits. I debated over a pack and play and this, but decided on this crib for its sturdiness and ability to fold away easily. It’s perfect! The mattress, although thin, it’s a good padding and enough for a newborn. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gab

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mini-crib for my daughter due to limited space. I anticipated it being similar to the one her baby sister slept in years ago, substantial but a little shaky. This crib does NOT shake at all. It is extremely sturdy and well built. I bought it in white, and it came in perfect condition. Assembly would have been easier if we had read all the instructions first. It does take two people but required limited time and effort (besides reading!). Buy the extra mattress since the one that comes with it is really just a pad. Very satisfied with this purchase with plans on using this crib well into the future for all the impending grandbabies!
customer_reviews.author: Stavia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for Memaw's house
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size crib for the Memaw's house. I had been searching for months for the right size portable, folding crib with sturdy rollers. I can roll this throughout the house and doorways with ease. Not too heavy to move from upstairs to downstairs if needed. I did purchase an additional 4" Mini Twinkle Stars crib mattress 38"X24", but keeping the included mattress for a floor tummy time mat. Very good price. I would buy this again if I needed. Very, very happy with this purchase for my 1st grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Kayce M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for grandparents
customer_reviews.text: I went ahead and bought a thicker mattress pad after reviewing the comments. I am very happy I chose this folding crib. After my grandchild left, we folded the crib up and slid it under the guest bed without any difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Health and safety hazard
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this crib but there are 2 significant issues: 1. The smell from the crib "off gassing" VOC chemicals is so strong. I just read a ton about it and apparently is terrible for your health too. I can't even air it out on my small apartment. 2. the mattress board didn't come with one of the swinging rod hinges so the mattress board rocks and is very unstable; i put it all together to find that it's unusable and a safety hazard.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything else about this crib for keeping close to our bed with our four month old but it has a very strong chemical smell. I assume it’s off gassing. I gave it a week in the study to air out, but it only got a little better. Brought it to the bedroom to use and give it more time but over a month later the smell remains strong. You can smell it even when you’re not beside it. I can’t lay my little one in here sadly. I’m going to have to look into returning which is disappointing. I had such high hopes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that it has roller and can fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mini crib to replace the pack and play that my granddaughter was sleeping in. She spends the nights here when her mother is working. The crib is about the same height as my bed so I can keep an eye on her. It's airy than the bottom of the pack and play. Also, I love the fact that it has roller and can fit through the doorway of the bedrooms without folding it up.
customer_reviews.author: Fred J. Bickerstaff

customer_reviews.title: Color , storage , and price , Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a small crib for my house for the grand babies. I really like the color ( gender neutral) durability and the easy storage . My husband put it together and I was not there so I do not know anything about the assembly . I bought a mattress to use in it because of the other reviews and I am happy I did. The “mattress” that comes with it is so thin, I realize so you can store everything together but seriously folks buy a different one and just store beside the bed. Overall though I would definitely recommend and would buy again. Great product and price!
customer_reviews.author: B Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great space saver, we pu2it together in about 30 minutes or so. I am glad that I got another mattress, dream me 3, the one that comes with the bed is a bit flimsy but i put them both in and seems good. There was a strange smell the first day but gone now. 2 days later, I ordered one more for my inlaws house and also, the mattress is fine. I did keep the other one I got just because it sleeps him a bit higher and easier for me to pick up the baby (I am kind of short).
customer_reviews.author: solomka20

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Little Crib
customer_reviews.text: Such a sturdy little crib. I love how easy it is to move (even on carpet) and how compactly it folds when you need it to. If you’re room sharing with your LO or simply don’t have a lot of space, this is a great crib to go with. It is small though and would probably be best for the 2 and under set. Probably have 18 months of comfortable use out of it which is still nice
customer_reviews.author: RBF

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this crib 5 stars for now! Package arrived in good condition, was fairly easy to assemble thanks to my husband.. and so far seems sturdy. I love how small it is and yet plenty of room for baby to sleep and grow with. My baby boy won’t be here for another 4 months so I’ll have to update this once it’s been used. My only concern is the mattress it came with is kind of thin, so I may order another one for more comfort. But I’m very happy with this purchase so far, it’s a super cute crib!
customer_reviews.author: Maritsa Piper

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't  buy again
customer_reviews.text: I've had this crib for about 5 months. I have a few issues with it. First, the wheels broke so now the crib isn't level and i have to lay something under the wheel.. Another problem I have with it is, it seems to me the bottom of it where the mattress sits on isnt level. In my opinion it seems like the product isn't made well. I'm not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Potential safety risk
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our baby, just wanting a crib that wouldn’t take up much room. The crib size is perfect, however now that our baby is almost a year old, she is frequently getting her legs stuck in the “bars” of the crib. I never had this happen with my other daughter in her crib, so it must be an issue with the size of this mini crib and the bars being the perfect size for a baby’s leg to her wedged in. I’m going to contact the manufacturer today and let them know.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda V.

customer_reviews.title: Good small crib
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet but first impression is that this will be a good master bedroom crib for when we have the baby with us in the beginning. Building it was very simple. I got the gray and the finish is nice and shiny. No imperfections. It’s chic which matches our decor. The wheels are nice so you can easily move the crib around. We’ll see how it works but I’m pleased so far
customer_reviews.author: noname

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t take too long to set up and I’m not by any means a handy person. It easily adjusts between two settings and seems sturdy for its small size and lightweight. When you need to fold up the crib, it’s very quick and easy to do so. Only downside I’ve come across is that I would follow other reviewers advice and purchase a portable crib mattress. The mattress that comes with it is more like a vinyl foam pad. All in all, this is a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foldable, mobile, small or large space, durable, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I had a bassinet & crib, but we put the crib together in another room & I wasn't ready for my baby to go to another room. My son exceeded bassinet weight limit and pack/play was so far down - close to the floor from bottom setting. Purchased this, good quality, fits in any space, easy fold. 2 height setting, despite what others said. Forget the bassinet & PP, get this!
customer_reviews.author: The Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it will go the distance.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. We have a special needs kiddo who isn't growing very fast and will be in a crib for a while, so we needed something more long-term than a pack-and-play. This fits nicely beside my bed, it's attractive, it seems durable, we can travel with it, and best of all, she likes being up at bed level and seeing what is going on. I am so happy that she is comfortable and that we have more space, and really it's quite attractive as well. Since our girl is older we got the 5" crib mattress and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Llovet

customer_reviews.title: Sleep haven
customer_reviews.text: We love this crib! I resisted for a long time in moving our baby to a crib (she slept happily in her bassinet), however the crib was a game changer. Our baby went from a pretty good sleeper to level pro! ,(12 hrs most nights). I will take it! Recommend getting he microfleece liner for the bottom and a bamboo mattress liner sheet (it is very comfortable for this otherwise bare foam mattress). Love the ease of this crib and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: A. Gush

customer_reviews.title: Perfect (Except the Mattress)
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to assemble by myself. It's cute, and it is smaller than a regular crib. There's adjustable levels for different stages. I would definitely buy a separate mattress though as the one they give you is very thin. I'm seriously regretting not getting mini crib for my other children in the past after having one. Love this crib.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to new parents all the time
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for when your baby is too big for a bassinet and too young to be in their own room. Perfect for us. Also used for travel. So so much nicer than the pack and play. I added an extra mattress.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisV

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib, will last longer than a bassinet and fits in my small apartment very well.. also super easy to close up to fit through the door or transport if needed. Looks expensive and very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Beckie

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one; and not because I needed to replace the 1st one. I have a daycare and I love the ease of folding this away when I have no babies to care for. I also love that it's not huge so it doesn't take up an enormous amount of space. It comes with a flimsy mattress - which is a plus for me because at least i have the minimum of what I need; however, my families typically buy the thicker more durable advertised mattress.
customer_reviews.author: SHAR

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling if baby won’t sleep in a pack n play
customer_reviews.text: Our baby wouldn’t sleep in a pack n play when we would travel and we would be up all night. So we decided to invest in this travel crib and it’s worth every penny!! We got mini bummers too so it reminded our baby of her crib back home and she sleep all night through. Now we feel like we can finally start traveling again without any stress!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We are going to be staying in another state for the summer and needed something more comfy than a play pen for the baby to sleep in and this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Eh....it’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: Size is perfect. Sturdy but not as sturdy as some reviews lead me to believe. If you have older kids who like to hang and climb, buy a mini crib that isn’t portable. I regret not. Being portable for me wasn’t as important as being solid. Also, the one I got does NOT have multiple height options. Only one. I feel that was false advertising. Also came with ZERO assembly directions. But I figured it out and assembled myself without help.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK S.

customer_reviews.title: Great crib and great value
customer_reviews.text: I was debating on getting a bassinet but they don't hold much weight and I didn't want to spend a bunch of money for my infant to only be in it for a short time. I spoke with my friend who suggested a mini-crib. The price is better and length of use will certainly be longer than the bassinet (considering the baby should be in your room from 6 months to preferably 1 year). This particular crib is sturdy and small enough to place in our room next to our bed. It is small enough to roll through our doorways from our room to the living room if we want. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Great. Only one height.
customer_reviews.text: This mini crib is great. I had it out of the box and set up within twenty minutes. Would have been quicker however my little one was napping nearby and I didn’t want to wake him. The only problem that I can complain about is that there is only one height that you can set it up as opposed to the two that it claims to have. My little man is only 7 weeks old so I was really looking forward to a higher height.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for my cosleeper
customer_reviews.text: We used this in our bedroom for our little girl who likes to stay close. She won't need another crib for a long time. Great quality. We did buy another mattress when we ordered, the one that comes with it is pretty thin. But the thicker one doesn't fold as well, so if that's important to your family, consider that.
customer_reviews.author: Joel and Carrie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great crib, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. I did it in about 20 minutes alone while stopping to tend to my kiddos in the process. Folding is easy and I love that it's on wheels tobe able to slide I to my closet when not in use. It's a good size crib and it's easy to adjust between the two heights. I bought a thicker mattress for though since the one that came with it is quite thin.
customer_reviews.author: B.ortiz

customer_reviews.title: In LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely wish I would have seen this crib when I had my other two children. This crib calling it perfect is an understatement. It’s a good size of you don’t like the big bulky cribs or of you don’t have a lot of room. The wheels work nice on hardwood floors but you don’t have to put the wheels on. The fold up portable part is amazing. It folds up really well if you travel or move from room to room. I bought a thicker mini mattress for the crib due to the mattress that comes with it is thin but I’m using it for an everyday bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Best crib around
customer_reviews.text: We love this crib! I am wishing we would have gone the mini crib route with all of our children. Easy to fold, easy to roll around, and fits almost anywhere. Same size as a pack and play basically so it’s perfect for our tiny home. Very aesthetically pleasing as well. Worth the purchase. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine bacher

customer_reviews.title: Completely tilted.
customer_reviews.text: The crib was somewhat easy to assemble, and would be a great space saver if i was able to use it at all. The notches that the board of the crib sits on are in the wrong spot, which makes the bed completely tilted. If I were to put my baby on this he would probably roll onto his face or roll all the way to the railing. Unfortunately I threw the box away before I realized and am unable to return this product. I was super excited for this as I needed a space saving crib that would fold away when not being used.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to put in parents bedroom
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a nursery but the American Academy of Pediatrics recommends that baby sleep in room with parents 1st year. 1st three months she used bassinet, but she is approaching weight limit so we transitioned her to mini crib up until she turns 1 year old & can go into her bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: We got this mini crib for our third baby, as she has been housed in the master bedroom. Pros: easy to use, comes with two level settings and wheels, great for small spaces. Cons: paint nicks easily, not sure if the lowest setting is low enough, “mattress” that it comes with pretty much like a pad. I would recommend buying better mattress. Our baby is 9 months old now- I’m not sure how much longer she will fit in it, but I will add a follow up review in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect it to be that good! The package I got was as heavy as a box with a regular crib. It’s very sturdy! It’s easy to move around since it’s on wheels. The mattress is firm, which is good for infant. Was easy to assemble without anyone’s help. The only thing I don’t like is a strong smell from the wood, probably paint, but I think it will go away with time. I just use it for short naps in the living room
customer_reviews.author: LadyOlgaRus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It's portable and the best crib I've ever bought. I don't see myself ever having to take this apart for anything. Especially since it's small enough to fit in a trunk when folded. It transitions very easily from bassinet to full crib, with just one clip. I do recommend sanding the wooden piece before putting the mattress on top of it. It has a ton of splinters. Other than that, it's my favorite baby purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: It's the "baby bear"....Just right!
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing negative I can say about this portable mini. I got what I was like looking for.... A transition between bassinet and full size crib. My granddaughter grew out of her bassinet quicker than anticipated, so this was just right because of the space of the bedroom. She sleeps in her mom and dad's room so it fit right in! The white finish is gorgeous! Looks like you paid way more than you did. Very happy "gamma"!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Portable Crib
customer_reviews.text: This portable crib is by far a great investment!! I was starting to get discouraged by reading the reviews but I must tell you, you have to love it, like it, and buy it. Great part is if you don't like it you can return it. For me it's a keeper! My 12 year old put this crib together. AND he didn't get frustrated, that says alot. My DD loves it, it's enough space for her to have her play time and bed time.
customer_reviews.author: Kanisha McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Great for small condo!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Super cute and easy to put together. I originally had the bottom screwed to wrong side so just look at the pictures in the instructions lol. The mattress it comes with is soft but not very thick. I did buy the dream on me mattress and my baby loves it! Great and sturdy for the price! Perfect for my little 1 bedroom condo!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Kay

customer_reviews.title: Smells absolutely toxic
customer_reviews.text: Why does it smell so bad?! Can't use because it is like sitting baby in a room filled with open varnish cans. I got a 4 day long migraine thanks to this thing which triggered some other health crap to flare so yeah... feel stupid purchasing this crib without seeing what the 1 star reviews were about.
customer_reviews.author: RK A

customer_reviews.title: Hard to bend down into it.
customer_reviews.text: Size is perfect for my bedroom. The mattress is super thin. I have a bed time lying my daughter down on the lowest setting, and the next one is too high for her getting up in her knees and standing. If one side could be raised up and down it would have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Atattooedbeauty

customer_reviews.title: Easy, foldable, gets an all night sleep in
customer_reviews.text: My sister and her family are going on a lot of weekend getaways this summer, visiting family. My nephew hates the packnplay. This is perfect. It is on wheels, and literally folds right up. They are all grateful that he will sleep well in this, and not wake the whole house.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great mini crib- just buy a separate mattress!
customer_reviews.text: We had been using a bassinet, but we like this mini crib much better. It’s easy to move from room to room. I did read other reviews which recommended buying a separate mattress since it really just comes with a thin mattress pad. I bought this one and it fits perfectly: Dream On Me 3 Mini/Portable Crib...  I think this will be great to use if we travel anywhere since we can fold it!
customer_reviews.author: KayJordan

customer_reviews.title: The crib is the perfect size and exactly what I'm looking for
customer_reviews.text: The crib is the perfect size and exactly what I'm looking for, but the only problem is it smells really strongly of paint. I purchased the white one and I'm worried about putting my baby in it cuz it stinks so bad!! Im going to leave it out for a few days and see if the stench goes away. Now I need to find something else to put my baby in. So irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Immediately, the paint on the crib began to chip when taking it out of the box. My husband said the directions were confusing but once he got to all of the parts, assembly was fine. We love how compact it is. We did not notice a chemical smell as others have. The mattress provided is horrible. Literally foam.
customer_reviews.author: chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Great size, sturdy but has a potent spray paint smell
customer_reviews.text: Great size, doesn’t come with instructions but my husband said it was pretty basic to put together. It puts off a very heavy chemical smell. Like spray paint. I walk in my room and instantly smell it. Hoping it’s non toxic and doesn’t bother him. Other than that we’re happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C.

customer_reviews.title: nice portable crib
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice cherry color, and fits great in an apartment bedroom. I am a female and I assembled it myself and it was confusing as there are only pictures as instructions. It took a few hours (maybe almost 2.5-3 hours). Good price. The mattress that comes with it is so thin that I bought another 3inch mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Atldancehall06

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell that will not go away!
customer_reviews.text: I would LOVE this crib if it wasn’t for the strong smell that just won’t go away! It’s so easy to move around and such a perfect size! I am so upset that I can’t use it. It’s been over a month and after airing it out almost every day along with wiping it down, the smell is still so strong. Now, I might be very sensitive as my husband says he can’t smell anything haha, but the strong paint / chemical smell drives me crazy.
customer_reviews.author: JM77

customer_reviews.title: SUPER  We couldnt be happier!!  LOVE  IT
customer_reviews.text: This little bed is fantastic- it's a mini of a big- quality bed. Great- real wood. smooth paint and sturdy. easy to assemble and even easier to fold up and move and store. love it !!! Wish I would have found this for the first grandkid - but #3 will use it for years
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful, but smells terrible as fresh paint. I've been trying to get that smell out since I won't put my baby to sleep inside a crib that can be toxic for her.... any advice?
customer_reviews.author: Wilmer Toro

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: This crib is exactly what I was looking for. I was looking for a small crib to keep in my bedroom while my little one needs to sleep in the same room with me. This crib fits exactly that! It's compact but big enough for her to have enough room in. I only deducted one star because I did need my husband to help me hold the pieces when assembling it and there was a scratch on the inside of the wooden frame that I noticed when I was unboxing it. Not big enough for me to want to return because we desperately needed a crib for our bedroom but still a reason to deduct one star.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Thomason

customer_reviews.title: Weak wheels but overall awesome crib!!
customer_reviews.text: This crib has been awesome for us being that our son is ever growing while we're still living in a smaller than preferred home, with even smalle rooms. It's been the only way for lil man to be able to comfortably sleep in his own bed, while still allowing just enough space to move about the bedroom around it and our bed. Only downfall I've found in the few days of use so far, is that the little wheels on it are super weak. One of them snapped right off as the crib was being rolled into place, with about as much force as it takes to snap a tooth pick. Otherwise great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B.

customer_reviews.title: Compact and sturdy - just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This crib is a great solution to our lack of plentiful space. We got a bit confused over the instructions as we assembled it, but we had it done within 40 minutes, maybe less. The crib appears to be well made and it bore no chips or scrapes or anything of the sort upon opening. And for around $100, we couldn't ask for a better price. We're pleased with this product and can't wait to try it out with Baby.
customer_reviews.author: Yehieli

customer_reviews.title: Good size, questionable durability.
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to assemble, easy instructions for folding to store. But instead of putting the caster wheels on I had to go buy adhesive felt furniture tabs to put on the bottom. The hole wasn’t drilled the hardware to pop the caster wheel in wasn’t there. I considered drilling a hole myself, but wild have had to gorilla glue the peg on the wheel to keep it installed. And without the wheels the legs scratched the floor. The mattress is also very thin, so will be replacing it. But it’s as described in the description of the crib and mattress, so it wasn’t a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Emily K

customer_reviews.title: Great for small rooms
customer_reviews.text: took maybe an hour for me to put it together. but i was not build to assemble things like this. very roomy and convenient if you want to move it somewhere. folds up really easy and you can move the mattress part 2 ways for it to the higher or lower
customer_reviews.author: deanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Crib for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib! We have a small home so this crib really a helps use the space wisely. It was pretty simple to put together and is easy to fold up and move around. I have been able to use it next to my bed after my baby outgrew the bassinet and then move it to the nursery which helped make the transition out of our room really easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Richey

customer_reviews.title: Who knew I needed a mini crib?
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mini crib for our second son when he had outgrown the snoo/bassinet but our older son was still occupying the full size crib. The price point was hard to pass up and I like that it's compact enough that we could make space for it in our van to take on a beach vacation or a weekend at the grandparents'. We upgraded to the better mattress, ordered a pack of three crib sheets, and a crib skirt and still paid under $200 for everything. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: LEC

customer_reviews.title: favorite crib
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this crib!!!! I have it at my bedside and it fits nicely. Also goes wonderfully in the nursery. Folds up small and easy. Everyone is always complementing me and asking where I got it. Definitely the perfect crib for small spaces!!!
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle chenail

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Best money spent. Just as good as my second child’s expensive custom mini crib, wish I had come across something like this 8 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable crib height
customer_reviews.text: There were a lot of reviews that said it didn't have the adjustable crib height. I needed the crib height to be adjustable. I am happy I bought it anyway. You can adjust the crib height to two different positions. I am convinced the other reviewers just didn't understand how the adjustment mechanism works. It is actually quite clever.
customer_reviews.author: Log Ans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Perfect for an in between stage when you’re waiting to move babes out of your room and into his/hers. This is cheap but the quality of the product and wood is great. Very easy to put together. Only need a screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Corie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Definitely funny how much smaller the mini cribs are compared to the regular cribs. It definitely works and it’s easy to assemble and whatnot. My son chews on the crib but hasn’t chewed the paint off so that’s good. Some crib paint comes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Literally perfect size for the small space I’m in. Only “issue” would be that you cannot adjust mattress height. It will be at the lowest level. So it’s not really an issue for me since my baby is 7months and just now transitioned from a bassinet. Though it could be a deal breaker for others. It also folds up nicely. The box was damaged when it arrived but the crib itself was fine, no scratches, breaks or nicks.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Very sturdy and durable material.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our split room, nursery and office space. Very sturdy and durable material. Very easy follow instructions and easy assembly. I wanted the grey color but it was sold out so I went with the white. I’m very happy with my purchase. I Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jalissa Queen👑

customer_reviews.title: Love my mini crib
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size crib. I wish I had had a mini crib for my first two kids. It’s the same dimensions (or close) to a pack n play, but taller. This crib is beautiful in a gray color. I’m very happy with the quality and sturdiness. The crib came with a “mattress” but it’s really a thin pad. I bought a separate mini mattress and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: LSB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our small space and it’s perfect!! It’s sturdy. The mattress it comes with is pretty soft and for that reason I would use it only if it was used on occasion, but personally I bought a separate mattress (delta). I love that it has wheels that way I’m able to bring the crib closer to my bed at night.
customer_reviews.author: JENNY

customer_reviews.title: I would NOT recommend this product ESPECIALLY for the price
customer_reviews.text: This crib broke within a week. The mattress is paper thin and doesn't serve any comfort to the child. I would NOT recommend this product ESPECIALLY for the price! Overpriced for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: curb is small in size we live in an apartment in NY. this curb is perfect as it is portable and small came with mattress but too thin so we bought another one. assembly took me about 30 min
customer_reviews.author: Mr KC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Grandma's house!
customer_reviews.text: This crib is way better quality than I expected for the price. It was very easy to put together and is very sturdy. Folds up easily and rolls... Perfect! I did purchase the 3" Dream On Me 3 Mini/Portable Crib Mattress, White- as suggested, as the 2" piece of foam is not adequate.
customer_reviews.author: EEC

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib so much! Our daughter sleeps in our room for the time being so it's nice to have something small, but big enough to keep her in there for a long time. She is currently 3 months old and this is all we've ever used because I figured she'd grow out of a bassinet too quickly. The matress is pretty thin, so we bought a thicker one. My only complaint is that the wheels aren't very durable. I think it's because of our carpet, but one of the wheels bent & it is just difficult to roll around. Other than that, I love it! Will recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jayna H

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Affordable, and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: As a mother of twins, I need cribs that will hold my babies over time, while still providing me with a good quality and low cost item. This crib is simple, easy to use, and easy to install. It's affordable, yet good quality; an easy to move, light-weight, space-saver. My twins are 16 months now, and the cribs are still as strong and useful as they were when they were newborns. It's everything you need in a crib. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Delta Children Folding Portable Mini Baby Crib with 1.5-inch Mattress, White
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteGreat for small spaces or as a travel crib, the Folding Portable Mini Baby Crib with Mattress from Delta Children is well built and versatile. Its wheels allow for easy movement throughout the home, so you can keep your baby nearby at all times. And, when you're on the go, it's easier than ever to provide a safe and comfy sleep space for your little one. Made from durable wood, it easily folds up, making it perfect for transport. Designed for convenience, the Folding Portable Mini Baby Crib with Mattress from Delta Children includes everything needed for a good night's sleep. Available in Grey, White, Dark Chocolate, Dark Cherry or Natural. New AAP guidelines say that babies should sleep in their parents’ rooms for the first year of their life, and this portable crib makes it easy to keep little ones close by. It’s the ultimate solution; a space-saver without sacrificing safety and design. Plus, it includes a mattress for additional convenience. Delta Children was founded around the idea of making safe, high-quality cribs affordable for all families. That’s why all Delta Children cribs are JPMA certified, and are tested above and beyond industry standards.

BRAND STORY
By Delta Children

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This Delta 3-in-1 foldable portable crib offers the ultimate in style, safety, functionality and convenience. A smaller item altogether (uses about 35% less space than a full-size crib), it's perfect for smaller spaces such as apartments, second homes or a night at the Grandparents. The crib features a 1 inch waterproof mattress and adjustable 2 position mattress support that allows the crib to be used as a bassinet, changer and/or play pen. Hooded caster wheels allow it to be moved easily from one room to another and because it's compact it fits easily through any doorway. When not in use the crib folds up to a mere 6 inches wide in minutes and can be stored away easily in a closet or under a bed. It's lightweight, very sturdy and built of solid hardwoods featuring a gorgeous (non-toxic) finish. This crib meets or exceeds all JPMA and ASTM safety standards and contains no lead. Minimal assembly required.

See more
feature_bullets: GREAT CRIB FOR SMALL SPACES OR TRAVEL: Crib includes casters for easy mobility; Folds flat for easy travel and storage; The included mattress (size: 37.5 Inches L x 23.25 Inches D x 1.5 Inches) stores right in the crib when folded
GROWS WITH BABY: The 2 position mattress height adjustment on this crib allows you to lower the mattress as your baby begins to sit or stand
BUILT TO LAST: Strong and sturdy wood construction helps create a dream nursery where you’ll spend plenty of Mommy and Me/Daddy and Me time; Easy assembly

WE PUT YOUR BABY’S SAFETY FIRST: This crib is JPMA certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by the CPSC & ASTM; Tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed government and ASTM safety standards

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,849 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
